name: Kathy W
text: Update: Followed the link sent by the owner in the reply and filled out the form for a second time. Same one I filled out before leaving this review. I was never contacted. I called the store to leave my contact information and spoke with ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Ryan
text: One of the better places I ever visited. People are very friendly and nice.

name: James Bishop
text: I am a truck driver and the restaurant at the truck stop was closed. I ordered from Hungry Howie's.  They gave me the pizza for free and thanked me for what I did. I am very appreciative,  but the most important part was that the pizza was excellent.  Thank you so much!!!!

name: Kaitlynn Sills
text: Ordered the mix and match deal online for pick up in store. When I went to pay I was told the promotion  was no longer available  and had to pay full price. The manager did not want to help me . It took an employee  saying she did that deal ‚Ä¶More

name: Darius Marque
text: They overcharged my wife  No more tip for you

name: JEFFREY VANDER KUYL
text: Very very slow! We had issues waiting with the cashier and had to wait 20 minutes afterwards for the pizza. We also were scammed 15 extra dollars by false advertising a deal! I will never in existence come back to this hungry howies even if I am dying of starvation! Top worst 3 restaurant experiences ever!

name: Corban Anderson
text: Stuffed Crust is amazing

name: Heather Myers
text: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE! MANAGERS ARE RUDE AF! Go to the gun lake hungry howies if you want great service and pizza!

name: Andrew French
text: Love the thin crust pizzas!!

name: Ryan Fahrne
text: I said I wanted the philly steak pizza about 3 times and they still gave me one with tomato sauce. I would give this place a 0 rating if I could I tried ordering a philly steak pizza for the 2nd time and the guy on the phone acted like he didn't have a clue of what I was talking about,  I'm done coming here

name: Nancy Hammond
text: Thin crust pizza was excellent!!! Thanks so much for making it just the way we like it!!!!

name: Teresa Kamps
text:
Edit- started delivering again!

After years of getting delivery they changed the delivery zone. We are less than 2 miles away and are not included.

name: Van LaVine
text: Good food for the price

name: Nichole Hargrove
text: They laugh at customers to other employees without putting them on hold. Never really had customer service that was good here but im done going here.

name: Michael Pigeon
text: I've been going here for a couple years. I always get good, friendly service. Delivery is super consistent as well. You should have some zza from there tonight! üçï

name: Jennifer Harmsen
text: They stopped delivering to my address 3.6 miles from the store which is annoying. The Iast three times I have orderes pizza they screw up my order and won't make it right.  Shame on me for giving them three chances.   I will not be going back!

name: Kaylee Swainston
text: Good food, good prices and good service.

name: Autumn Nichols
text: Great pizza great deals ‚ù§

name: Polly Gates
text: They forgot the sauce

name: Stephan Crifasi
text: Best pizza place ever get to know them and they treat you well

name: william wilson
text: I just order 2 Howies Cookies üç™ and they are burnt really really what a shame to have food be wasted like this...

name: Thomas Kemp
text: Good, fast pizza and other lunch or dinner items

name: Ryan W.
text: Always have great service and food here. Thanks Howie's!

name: Bob Haas
text: Great service and great food

name: Don Ivers
text: Kinda pricey. Always call and ask for coupons. The staff is great but management is kind of rude. Decent pizza.

name: Anthony Guzman
text: Hailing from Chicago..must say that this place was pretty good. Thin crust was good! The slices could have been cut better though. Overall, not to bad for Michigan Pizza.

name: Mansfield Property Service MPS
text: This location is hit or miss,  good if you pick it up. 2 of our delivery orders had enough cheese for 5 pizzas . 10-27-17 happened again 4x the cheese, we ate a few slices a threw it out. Jets can you please come to Wayland

name: Daniel Plouffe
text: Great sause mostly competent staff . management are awesom all three of them. The special menu is great with the cool assortment of flavor crust.

name: Travis Klinge
text: They have a new manager named Colton who refuses to deliver to my house. Btw when I called he had all my information. He was rude and oblivious he didnt want to do his job. They have delivered to my house for the last year and I always tip well. I will NEVER be back.

name: Marybeth Dykstra
text: Really good pizza. Very happy that they have a gluten free option.

name: The Fizzy
text: Good food, just little long to get a pizza.

name: Toni Clayton
text: Great food and service

name: Faron Frazee
text: They are good. It's just that the crust flavoring is awfully strong so beware of ordering extraüòÅ

name: Shirley Rand
text: Prices are good pizza was great .

name: K. D.
text: Good and fast pizza and who doesn't like cheesy bread!! Be sure to sign up online to receive awesome coupons (.99 cheesy bread) and specials specific to online ordering.

name: Lawrence Harnish
text: If you are hungry see Howy

name: Tom Bartell
text: Deep dish supreme was awsome

name: Tori Schulte
text: I order from them often ! Love their boneless wings. They usually say they wait will be 35-40 minutes normally gets here before that always warm and delicious food Extremely friendly staff!‚ù§

name: melissa barber
text: Food is good

name: Cody VanHouten
text: Hit or miss with online ordering. Shorted it on the extra toppings. Told manager that I was unsatisfied and did nothing to correct the issue. Not very helpful.

name: Amy Syers
text: Just left picked up my lunch.  Ordered online.  Did not take the free Howie Bread off.  Needed to go back and ask for a refund.  Ordered extra sauce and when I got back to the office--only one sauce for the Howie Bread.  A little disappointed today with the service.

name: Adam G
text: Always courteous. Almost never get my order wrong. Good pizza and service.

name: Amanda Wondergem
text: Amazing food.. Always fast if you stop in.. Delivering add about 10-15mins on to your est.     wait time.

name: Kaitlin Yankovich
text: As a frequent customer I have never recieved bad service. Hot pizza, nice drivers and a wholesome time is to be expected each time I order.

name: Kyle McBride
text: Besides not getting use our coupons, the staff was very helpful with choosing bread seasonings. They were very customer oriented.

name: Kenneth Williams
text: Pretty good.

name: Janice Hilaski-Roberts
text: The employee's are awesome there!

name: Shirley Van
text: Didn't care for the original crust on pizza &  very greasy.

name: Truecuzzo2
text: They forget my sides every single time.

name: Thomas Wheeler
text: I got a BBQ chicken pizza from here today which this is my first time using this location but it was by far the worst one I've had and I order this kind of pizza often. There was barely any sauce and maybe 3 toppings on each piece I think I got like 2 pieces of chicken on a whole 14" pizza it was dry and tasteless needless to say.

name: Adam Fahling
text: A wonderful pizza shop. As a former employee of the Cedar Springs Hungry Howie's, I'm very jealous of how nice this place is in comparison.

name: Zech Cowles
text: Their management and crew are very nice.

name: Susan Doran
text: Yummy

name: Toni Clayton
text: Great food

name: Barbara Precord
text: Love the wings

name: strapped9
text: Well worth the cost.

name: DAWSON LEWIS
text: Great pizza

name: Hercules gray
text: Pizza

name: Edwin Lelieveld
text: Good food

name: John Kitchen
text: Do not order online here. They will screw it up every time. Check your order before you leave.

name: Thelma Washington
text: Awsome pizza and love the flavor crust

name: Brandi Door
text: Entire order was delivered incorrectly, without the additional purchased sauces and 30 minutes later than projected delivery time.
